root: ^Well hello dear son! It sounds like you've caused quite a stir about the castle tonight!
^My most sincere of apologies, father. It took longer than expected. In better news, Netrixi has discovered an overwhelming quantity of Beholderite. She will help us secure it and bring it to safety.
^Brilliant! Do not delay. Go and bring that Beholderite back to me! I mean, the castle! So we can... uh store it in the vault? Yes, store it in the vault!
